synopsis.text: Arata is an unfortunate student facing expulsion from his school due to poor grades. His only hope to continue his education is to study the magic Archives of the Trinity Seven, a mysterious group of seven skilled female mages. As part of his special curriculum, Arata must learn more about these archives from each member of the Trinity Seven one-on-one. Through these private lessons with the powerful sorceresses, the previously struggling Arata hopes to uncover the secrets of the archives while getting a unique magical education unlike any other. With his future on the line, Arata embarks on an enlightening journey into the world of magic alongside the Trinity Seven. Will he successfully master the archives and save his place at school? Or will the mystical arts prove too much for him to handle?
